wiki.summary: Demi is the fourth studio album by American recording artist Demi Lovato, released on May 14, 2013 by Hollywood Records. Its lead single "Heart Attack" debuted at number 12 on the U.S. Billboard Hot 100, and has thus far peaked at number 10, becoming her second highest-charting single in the country to date. Lovato posted all of the songs on her website a week early, but they will be available on iTunes on May 14, as originally planned.
